original_title: NDDCB Confirms Mephedrone in Coastal Seizure
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The National Dangerous Drugs Control Board (NDDCB) has confirmed that the substance found in possession of a Moldovan national in the Weligama area is Mephedrone, a highly potent and dangerous synthetic narcotic.Following detailed laboratory analysis, the NDDCB officially handed over the final report to the Weligama Police yesterday, confirming the presence of the banned psychoactive substance.
